string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Who is the Ideal Customer? Why does the problem persist? How is it solved today?
Strength/Weaknesses? Reasons Customers will choose You?
Revenue Model? Pricing? Costs involved, profitability?
3 Key Market Assumptions? Addressable Market Size?
3 Channel Strategies? Cost per Strategy to hit MVP milestones?
Metric Target Milestones? Top 3 Features? Cost/Details?
